title: Bloomberg Markets: Ripple CEO on SEC's Digital Tokens Stance
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ripple CEO on SEC's Digital Tokens Stance
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Brad Garlinghouse Chief Executive Officer Ripple Discussing discuss the US Securities and Exchange Commission saying on Tuesday that the offering and sale of digital tokens "are subject to the requirements of the federal securities law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
